title: Formative Assessment Design Workshop for Blended Mathematics Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and blended learning environment experience
context.additional_context: Course Focused on Developing and Applying Blended Assessment Strategies in a Microlearning Environment Utilizing Mobile Devices for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more purposes of formative assessment (process monitoring, feedback provision) in blended learning environments.
Learners can design five or more formative assessment items (quizzes, problem-solving tasks) suitable for mobile microlearning in mathematics.
Learners can propose methods to incorporate practitioner feedback into the assessment process using learner engagement-driven evaluation strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
